page.title: 17Hilliers Sausage Factory.
page.content: After this we went over to the sausage factory where we washed our hands again.We went into a room which was a large refrigerator where they kept the meat at minus{1}degree centigrade.There were{20}kilos of pork on each tray.A bowl-chopper which chopped the meat and mixed in the other ingredients was next to the refrigerator.The bowl-chopper costs{ {Â£50,000.}Sausages are made of {65% meat:beef or pork.From one batch of meat,{1200}sausages are produced.Next we saw the sausage-meat being put into the skins.There are{2}kinds of machines for putting sausages into the skins.One uses a metal bar with skin put on it,into which the meat is squeezed.The other machine moulds skin into a sausage shape with meat in it. Afterwards we were each given a pork pie and some sausages to take home.
